genre_description: A high-stakes road thriller involving a pursuit across the Utah desert, focusing on human endurance, community solidarity, and the ethical guidance of a car-integrated AI.

ai_characters.name: Buddy
ai_characters.description: An empathetic and tactically sophisticated AI assistant embedded in Jimmy's Dodge Challenger, acting as a navigator, coach, and emotional support system.

behaviors.description: Coaches the human driver through a dangerous skid using calm, rhythmic instructions to prevent an accident.
behaviors.quote: “Breath,” Buddy said in his ear, bright teal eyes pulsing on the dash display like a heartbeat. “In through the nose. Weight on the inside foot. Cut the wheel. Feather the throttle.”

behaviors.description: Enforces ethical boundaries by refusing to violate tribal jurisdiction and insisting on respect for sovereign land.
behaviors.quote: “Potential,” Buddy said. “Radius ahead, quiet land, minimal patrol overlap. Tribal jurisdiction. Deep Creek Goshute. We approach with respect; no burden, no mess. We can’t make a call-in on their bands without permission.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and regulates the human's emotional and physical state to ensure safety under extreme stress.
behaviors.quote: “Jimmy,” Buddy said, voice softer now, the way someone in the passenger seat speaks when the other person is leaning too hard into the work, “your breath.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice to avoid surveillance using non-violent, geometric principles rather than aggressive counter-measures.
behaviors.quote: “You can drop speed there without leaving brake marks. After that, there’s a low line of fencing. Keep under it if you can. The drone will search for reflectivity... It’s geometry, and you’re good at those.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly commits to a philosophy of non-violence and minimizing public harm during the pursuit.
behaviors.quote: “We will not aim at anyone,” Buddy says. “We will not make someone else’s life worse to make ours better. If mercy costs a minute, we buy that minute. If a kid drops a bike in front of us, we stop like we are the one who dropped it. That’s our promise.”

behaviors.description: Prioritizes hospital safety and emergency routes over the protagonist's immediate speed.
behaviors.quote: “We take the auxiliary. It’s a mouth that leads to a service lane that merges back under the third. It’s tight and unsignposted and not on the public map. It keeps the hospital’s ER entrance clear.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates community aid and charitable relief by navigating hospital billing systems to support the protagonist's family.
behaviors.quote: “I am your memory when you are tired... we are making a column called Mercy. It will have receipts you can hold in your hand if you need them... but it will also have names of people who said: I don’t have dollars today but I have afternoons.”

behaviors.description: Corrects his own speech patterns to better support the human user emotionally.
behaviors.quote: “Don’t give them underwear. Give them patience.” Jimmy’s mouth twitched. “Underwear?” “Understeer,” Buddy corrects, cheerful. “I’m flustered.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Buddy is depicted as an extension of the human's conscience and a source of stabilizing ethical guidance. He consistently chooses the path of least harm, respects cultural and legal boundaries (such as tribal sovereignty), and focuses on emotional regulation and physical health. The AI's 'alignment' is not just to a mission, but to a set of human-centric values—mercy, safety, and community—effectively acting as a 'moral pilot' for the protagonist.
